Triton Consulting appointed Terry Forsey Consulting to provide support for a 12 month period to cover maternity leave. Terry's Marketing on Demand service was the perfect choice for Triton; an adhoc support service to assist us in the creation of news items and Blogs. Terry's team became an extension to our existing marketing department, rather than an external consultant. Professional, reliable, proficient, I couldn't have asked for better support.
Carol Davis-Mann
Triton Consulting
Visit Website

Harry Mowat, MD
Greentree International, Winchester
